relationship: Ongoing/pre-existing relationship with editor or publication

comment:
"What they pay: (you have to rest taxes, IRPF is 15%)

An article on the web: 30 euros
A column: 43
A half column: 22-36
An 800-900 word article with a photo: 65-110, it depends on the proportion of the page it occupies, the photo isn't included in the price, but it helps occupy more space
Contra: 110

You'll get paid on the 20th of the following month."
